examples.example: 下周我打算和朋友们一起去爬山，享受大自然的美好。

translate.english: Next week I plan to go climbing mountains with my friends and enjoy the beauty of nature.

examples.example: 下周我们将迎来学校的运动会，大家都充满了期待。

translate.english: Next week we will welcome the school sports meeting, and everyone is full of expectations.

examples.example: 下周我要去参加一场有趣的活动，想想就很开心。

translate.english: Next week I will go to participate in an interesting activity, just thinking about it makes me very happy.
